message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its value to you, we believe it's worth considering an investment of $950,000. This price reflects not only the product's worth but also our commitment to providing exceptional service and support. We're confident this investment will yield significant benefits for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the value of your product, I'm working within a specific budget. I'd be willing to purchase the product for $700,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to present a more flexible option for you. Considering your budget constraints, I propose we aim for a mutually beneficial arrangement at $825,000. This price still reflects the product's value while offering some flexibility to accommodate your financial situation.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  To be frank, $800,000 is the highest I'm able to go.  I believe this is a fair offer, considering I have other options available.
